title: Fans are mourning Tom Holland's hair after the actor got a buzz cut
text:
Fans have lost their minds after actor Tom Holland said goodbye to his long locks and opted for a short buzz cut in recent days.

The new hairstyle was first publicly unveiled at the ACE Comic Con in Rosemont, Illinois, over the weekend when the actor, 23, attended the event with his other Spider-Man: Far From Home cast members.

'I really like it,' Tom said during the event when asked about the change in hairstyle. 'I don't know about you, but I really, really like it. It's so much easier to manage.

Surprise! Tom Holland, 23, (pictured with Jake Gyllenhaal) publicly unveiled his shaved head when attending ACE Comic Con this past weekend in Rosemont, Illinois

Big change: He shaved off his head in preparation for filming his latest movie called Cherry where he will play an army medic. Pictured right is Tom in July

All the drama: Fans immediately took to Twitter to express their dismay over his new haircut

His latest haircut is not an act of rebellion, though, but instead the actor preparing for his upcoming role in Cherry.

In the role, Tom will be playing an army medic who becomes a serial bank robber due to his drug addiction. The role involves short hair to fit with army codes.

Fans online were not impressed with the new hairstyle, though.

And the abrupt change convinced some to take to Twitter so they could 'mourn' Tom's old hair.

'Rest in peace to Tom Holland's beautiful hair. You will be missed,' one upset wrote after hearing the news.

Another person wrote: 'What did Tom Holland do with his hair I'm having a stroke.'

Hilarious: The new haircut inspired some fans to compare Tom to other people, including cartoon character Caillou

Guess who's back! One fan compared Tom to Eminem because of the new look

Mourning: Fans went all out with the drama when it came to Tom's new hair. But the actor said he looked the new look and thought it was easy to manage

Commenters were unafraid to compare the Spider-Man star to a number of people after he unveiled the shaved cut, including rapper Eminem, cartoon character Caillou, and even Pitbull.

'Tom holland shaved his head and now he looks like caillou,' a fan wrote sharing a picture of both people to prove their point.

There was no lack of drama from disgruntled fans after the new haircut was unveiled, with some going as far as to joke about throwing a funeral for Tom's old locks.

'We are gathered here today in memory of Tom Holland's Prince Charming hair. Gone but never forgotten rest in peace,' a fan wrote, sharing a picture of Tom as Spider-Man.

Another fan shared similar sentiments, writing: 'R.I.P Tom Holland's hair you will be missed but not forgotten.'

Tom could be easily swayed to keep the short hairstyle after wrapping up filming for Cherry after he already confessed to liking how easy the new hairdo is to manage.
description: Tom, 23, publicly unveiled his shaved head when attending ACE Comic Con this past weekend in Rosemont, Illinois.
